content: Useful Accessibility Links - The Design System Guide Close accessibility # Useful Accessibility Links Romina Kavcic Here is a list of helpful resources about accessibility. 🔗 WCAG [https://www.w3.org/WAI/standards-guidelines/wcag/] 🔗 Accessibility Project [https://www.a11yproject.com/] 🔗 Stark Accessibility Library [https://www.getstark.co/library/all/] 🔗 Inclusive Design Toolkit, [https://inclusive.microsoft.design/]by Microsoft 🔗 Accessibility Support [https://a11ysupport.io/] 🔗 IBM Accessibility Toolkit [https://www.ibm.com/able/] 🔗 Diversity & Inclusion Workshop Miro Kit [https://miro.com/miroverse/diversity-and-inclusion-workshop-the-multiverse-toolkit/] 🔗 Inclusive Components Library [https://inclusive-components.design/] 🔗 Giving a damn about Accessibility by [https://www.accessibility.uxdesign.cc/]Sheri Byrne-Haber, CPACC 📘 Inclusive Components [https://www.smashingmagazine.com/printed-books/inclusive-components/] (book) by Heydon Pickering 🔗 How To Create Accessible Design System Components [https://www.supernova.io/blog/how-to-create-accessible-design-system-components] by Geri Reid Discover how to prioritize accessibility in design system components with expert Geri Reid.
